titles.title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require issuers to disclose in an annual report any substantial financial relationship with any manufacturer or dealer of firearms or ammunition.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Investor Choice Against Gun Proliferation Act
This bill requires specified issuers of securities to annually disclose any substantial financial relationship with a manufacturer or dealer of firearms or ammunition.
